head.title: CheerpJ 3 Xalan XSLT 3 development branch XSLT 3 workbench

section.h2: Features using Xalan Java XSLT 3 development branch

ul.li: optional automatic evaluation of XSLT as CheerpJ 3 also allows to run Java code (e.g. Xalan) from a web worker
errors and warnings are hopefully now all reported in the result/output editor pane
